body: I guess since we're registering all the kernels in the same files as CPU and GPU, this is fine.  Otherwise I'd have suggested defining something like a sycl/defs.h header where common SYCL-specific defines could go.
body_html: I guess since we're registering all the kernels in the same files as CPU and GPU, this is fine. Otherwise I'd have suggested defining something like a sycl/defs.h header where common SYCL-specific defines could go.
